co.cask.cdap.api.dataset.lib

Interface ACLTable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable, Dataset

    @Beta
public interface ACLTable
extends Dataset
    A dataset that stores ACLs.

    • Method Detail

      • setAcl

        ACL setAcl(Principal principal,
         EntityId entityId,
         Iterable<PermissionType> permissions)
        Sets an ACL on an entityId for a principal.
        Parameters:
        principal - the principal to set the ACL for
        entityId - the entityId to set the ACL on
        permissions - the list of permissions to allow the user access to entityId

      • setAcl

        ACL setAcl(Principal principal,
         EntityId entityId,
         PermissionType... permissions)
        Sets an ACL on an entityId for a principal.
        Parameters:
        principal - the user to set the ACL for
        entityId - the entityId to set the ACL on
        permissions - the list of permissions to allow the user access to the entityId

      • getAcls

        List<ACL> getAcls(EntityId entity,
                Iterable<Principal> principals)
        Gets ACLs belonging to an entityId and a list of principals.
        Parameters:
        entity - the entityId whose ACLs we want
        principals - the principals whose ACLs we want
        Returns:
        the list of ACLs of ACLs relevant to an entityId, for a user and its groups
